item.title: Tips for rental property financing
item.description: Purchasing a rental property can be a great way to build equity and use rental income to help service your mortgage debt. If you are considering purchasing a rental property there a number of things to consider when it comes to financing. If you are looking to purchase a property with multiple units and occupy one of the units, financing may be available up to 95% as this would be considered owner occupied.
